text: (Dawuda) ya ce: "Lalle, haƙiƙa ya zalunce* ka game da tambayar tunkiyarka zuwa ga tumakinsa. Kuma lalle ne masu yawa daga abokan tarayya, haƙiƙa, sashensu na zambatar sashe face waɗanda suka yi imani, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai." Kuma Dawuda ya tabbata cewa Mun fitine shi ne, saboda haka, ya nemi Ubangijinsa gafara, kuma ya faɗi yana mai sujada, kuma ya mayar da al'amari ga Allah
